name: Feed the Crown: Deluxe Edition (Movement Demo)
name_original: Feed the Crown: Deluxe Edition (Movement Demo)
description:
[Note: This is a demo for a project that is in development. The full game has not been released at this time. To stay up to date, follow me on my twitter]

Hard to believe it's been nearly THREE months since my last update! I can't thank everyone enough for their patience. You can scroll down to download the file, or click here to read Devlog #5 and learn more about the progress on the game.

As a reminder, there is a forum topic for "Feed the Crown" over at Weight Gaming, so feel free to join the discussion there.
